China is publicly shredding Japan with propaganda, cancelled concerts, and online hate campaigns—but behind the outrage is a quieter truth: the CCP relies heavily on Japanese culture, tourism, investment, and even the country’s stability. Chris uncovers why Beijing attacks Japan in public while Chinese elites, students, and families quietly flock there in record numbers.

title: For All the Hate, China Secretly Loves Japan
